name: KOUDAI IWATSUBO
info:
• 别名: Koudai Iwatsubo
  • 别名: イワツボコーダイ
  • 别名: Koudaiii
  • 性别: 男
  • 生日: 1984-03-05

detail:
Professional career started as a guitarist and from 25 years old, as a composer, arranger and songwriter.
Many songs only by myself and also write with many people in all over the world, and provide songs to many major artists.
